message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. As the current owner, I'm willing to part with it for a price of $900,000. I think this is a fair and competitive offer, considering the product's value to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $900,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to save even more.  I'm willing to pay $800,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm still willing to negotiate. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell it to you for $850,000. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
